title: NFL ATL: Who has the NFL's best offense?
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Who has the NFL's best offense?
description:
A room full of heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler -- react to the latest NFL news including the Browns QB battle, the rise of Teddy Bridgewater and more. The guys also debate the best offensive team this season and answer your mailbag questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
